org.nanoko.playframework.mojo

Class WarPackageMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • org.nanoko.playframework.mojo.AbstractPlay2Mojo
        • org.nanoko.playframework.mojo.WarPackageMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo

    public class WarPackageMojo
extends AbstractPlay2Mojo
    Packages the Play application as War.
